backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 145 Portland Street

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 76-2020 to designate 145 Portland Street (Spadina-Fort York, Ward 10) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.
